casebody.data:
NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF CHILD PROTECTION AND PERMANENCY, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
R.L.M., Defendant,
and
J.J., Defendant-Petitioner. In the Matter of the Guardianship of R.A.J., a Minor-Respondent. C-335 September Term 2017
079473 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 1, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-2849/3277-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
